item.description:
This intriguing restaurant combines innovative and unexpected culinary creations with a hand-picked collection of complementary wines. Check out their website at www.bergamotrestaurant.com to see what I mean!

It is a very easy place to over-indulge both your appetite and your pocketbook. But this is January, the month where everyone is recovering from holiday excesses. So let's sample Bergamot's pleasures in a more affordable way. On week nights before 7 p.m., they offer a 3 course prix fix dinner for $39 . . . at this time of year, that is SO much more my style!

As always, your reservation fee will be added in to the tax and tip, which I'll figure for the table. So it is not really a fee. But it IS an excellent way to ensure that people are serious about coming. And in this case, since I have a potential cancellation fee on my credit card for the reservation, I need you to be serious about coming! Note the cutoff date for RSVPs, which is a bit earlier than our usual.
item.name: Early bird prix fixe dinner at Bergamot
